name: Dance of the dice
description:
You are a dice trying to throw smaller dice at evil dice. Alot of die (die? dices?) I know. If you roll yourself, whatever number you roll is how many projectiles you will shoot.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move around. Space to roll yourself.

This is the first game jam that I have attended. The GMTK Jam 2022 logo  belongs to Game Makers Toolkit.
